title: U.S. SENATOR JOHN L. KYL (R-AZ) HOLDS A HEARING ON BORDER SECURITY ISSUES
body:
U.S. SENATE JUDICIARY COMMITTEE: SUBCOMMITTEE ON IMMIGRATION,
BORDER SECURITY AND CITIZENSHIP AND SUBCOMMITTEE ON TERRORISM,

TECHNOLOGY AND HOMELAND SECURITY HOLD A JOINT HEARING TO EXAMINE

FEDERAL STRATEGIES TO END BORDER VIOLENCE

 

MARCH 1, 2006

 

SPEAKERS:

SUBCOMMITTEE ON IMMIGRATION, BORDER SECURITY AND CITIZENSHIP

U.S. SENATOR JOHN CORNYN (R-TX)

CHAIRMAN

U.S. SENATOR CHARLES E. GRASSLEY (R-IA)
